cards.title: Ninetails
powers: The next time {Ninetails} would be dealt 2 or less damage, redirect it to another target.
incapacitatedAbilities: One hero may use a power.
Redirect the next damage dealt to a hero target to another target.

openingLines.default: Just because I'm new to this doesn't mean I can't outfox you.
openingLines.TricksterFoxCharacter: What did you do to me? What am I?
openingLines.OblivAeonFrontPageCharacter: This is bad, this is bad, this is bad!

cards.title: Scientific Approach To Magic
cards.body: Whenever you discard a card, {Ninetails} gains 1 HP. At the end of your turn, you may discard a card.
cards.flavorReference: Jade Fisher, Guardians of Tomorrow Annual #5

cards.title: Fox Marble
powers: {Ninetails} deals 1 target 1 fire damage. You may draw 1 card or play 1 ongoing card.

flavorQuotes.text: Jade, what do you have there?
I think it's part of my soul.

cards.title: Fox Shape
cards.body: Whenever damage is redirected from {Ninetails}, increase or reduce it by 1.
cards.flavorText: It's weird how natural being a quadruped feels. I haven't tripped once! And how am I talking with this mouth?

cards.title: Jade's Collar
cards.body: When {Ninetails} would be dealt damage by an environment card, you may discard a card to redirect it to a villain target.
cards.flavorText: I hate pretending to be someone's pet, but it has saved my life several times.

cards.title: Spirit of Deception
cards.body: At the end of your turn, you may destroy an ongoing card. If you do, destroy this card. When this card is destroyed, {Ninetails} deals each non-hero target 1 irreducible psychic damage.
cards.flavorText: What are lies? ... What is truth?
cards.flavorReference: Spirit of Deception, Guardians of Tomorrow #82

cards.title: Spirit Visions
cards.body: The first time each turn {Ninetails} would take damage, redirect it to a ghost in her play area.
powers: Discard a card. If you do, put a ghost from your trash into play or your hand.

cards.title: Predatory Nature
cards.body: When this card enters your hand, put it into play. Damage dealt by {Ninetails} cannot be redirected. At the end of your turn, Ninetails deals 1 other hero target 2 melee damage. If no damage is dealt this way, she deals herself 4 irreducible toxic damage.
powers: Destroy a target with 3 or fewer HP. If a target is destroyed this way, {Ninetails} regains 3 HP, then shuffle this card into your deck.
cards.flavorText: What have I done? What have I done!?

cards.title: Burning Whisper
cards.body: Increase all fire damage by 1. When this card enters play, {Ninetails} deals up to 2 targets 1 fire damage each. At the start of your turn, destroy this card.

cards.title: Twisting Cinder
cards.body: At the end of your turn, this card may deal 1 target up to 3 fire damage. If 3 or more damage is dealt this way, destroy this card. When this card is destroyed, draw 2 cards.
cards.flavorText: I don't know what they are, they just keep following me around.

cards.title: Fox Echo
cards.body: At the end of your turn, each player may draw a card. If at least {H - 1} cards are drawn this way, destroy this card. When this card is destroyed, you may play an ongoing card.
cards.flavorText: They're the remnants of those who undertook this quest before... and failed.

cards.title: Dancing Flame
cards.body: {Ninetails} deals 1 target 1 fire damage and 1 melee damage. You may discard a card. If you do, redirect the next damage dealt to Ninetails to that target.
cards.flavorText: I'm glad to see you're putting those dance lessons to good use.

cards.title: Stalked By Ghosts
cards.body: {Ninetails} deals 1 target 3 infernal damage. Reveal cards from your deck until a ghost is revealed. Put it into play. Discard the other revealed cards and shuffle your trash into your deck.
cards.flavorText: Once ghosts realize you can see them, they absolutely will not ever leave you alone.

cards.title: Foxfire Burst
cards.body: {Ninetails} deals each non-hero target 2 fire damage. You may discard a card. If you do, you may play a card.
cards.flavorText: Back, foul spirits! Did I do that right?

cards.title: Book Smarts, Street Smarts
cards.body: Either draw 3 cards or redirect the next damage dealt to {Ninetails} to another target.

flavorQuotes.text: Despite my magic power, I'm a scientist at heart.
That, Miss Fisher, is precisely why we want you in the Bureau Arcanum.

cards.title: Assert Humanity
cards.body: You may destroy one of your ongoing cards. If you do, {Ninetails} deals up to 2 targets 3 melee damage each.
cards.flavorText: I am NOT a MONSTER! I am a PERSON!

promoCards.title: Ninetails
powers: Discard up to 3 cards. {Ninetails} deals up to X targets 1 fire damage each where X is 3 + 2 times the number of cards discarded this way
incapacitatedAbilities: One player may draw a card.
One player may play a card.
Choose a non-hero target. Damage dealt to that target is irreducible until the start of your next turn.

openingLines.default: I've learned, I'm ready to be a hero this time!
openingLines.TricksterFoxCharacter: I am not like you. I will never be like you.
openingLines.OblivAeonFrontPageCharacter: This is one fox who won't let your hounds get her!
